title: Could we please have the option to change Ward/Summoner icon in champ select?
body:
So many times i have selected a champ like Azir or skin like dark candy fiddlesticks and thought, it would be cool if i had the shurima summoner icon/ward selected or the candy wards and a xmas icon selected, but most often you don't and with the new themed poro ward's/summoner icons it is just too perfect an opportunity to go full dragonslayer or full battlecast themed 
it would also be neat if someone in the team said "lets all go battlecast skins or something" then you could all change icons/wards too for full epicness.
this has probably been suggested before but i haven't seen it.

what do u think?

replies.body: It's a fine suggestion but I doubt Riot will put this into the game :(
Its unlikely, :( but if we don't ask we get 0% chance of getting it, so its better to try at least :P
riot likes money though. more accessible ward skins, more ward skin sales. because there is no real reason to own more than one currently. in saying that, i have four. haha. ahh.

> [{quoted}](name=WeakboyLuvLadies,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Fe2TKn1G,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-14T03:03:53.476+0000)
>
> It's a fine suggestion but I doubt Riot will put this into the game :(

True
This needs to happen, i have always thought this would be a good idea
Lets try our best to work it into the game
I support this idea but you must understand that players are more likely to be in possession of a champion skin rather than a ward skin. Most of the time players only have the default skin.
This doesnt replace the champion skin select, it just adds the option to change the ward as well, seeming they are releasing more and more wards now

exactly. it is of no consequence to skin select, it purely changes the aesthetics of the ward, its like saying to skin users. pick your skin pre Que. because screw choice. you make your decision and stick with it. and if you forget. who cares. some of us bought ward skins. and would like to flash them around. its like. what you do. haha.

Ward skins yes, it doesn't really make sense to me that we can change champion skins but not ward skins in selection.

However I don't agree on the summoner icons.
why do you disagree on summoner icon select? you wouldn't HAVE to use it. but some people would like it. a lot of people play league.
Because there is no point in changing it for a match. It will be seen only in the loading screen and not in game.

so? an unavailable summoner icon from years back can strike fear per game in an opponent, also you can make yourself look unnasumng by using a free available summoner icon. also having a whole team with the same one would be intimidating, the point is free choice. just because you don't care. does no mean no one does.  variety is the spice of life my friend.

And in no way will five people using the same icon be intimidating, you want five people to be intimidating? You all change your names to include a clan tag.


The loading screen only lasts 5 seconds, what is the point in changing something specifically for a match that will only be seen for 5 seconds? THERE IS NO POINT AT ALL!

dude, settle. its not horse%%%%, different people react to different things, you sir, may be different to me, so are a lot of people, that does not make me wrong. its basic pych man. but i do not expect someone who is losing their %%%% over something this minute to understand that people aren't all like them. obviously you are quite caustic. also yes a pax sivir is intimidating if you came in to league long after it was unavailable. its not JUST YOU that plays league. also many load screens take longer than 5 seconds. you are just full of hate aren't you? hate for summoner icons. you bigot!

I'm pretty sure I'd know if a skin I use 90% of the time I play Sivir is intimidating or not.

I am full of hate yes, but that doesn't make what I've said wrong.

thing is. it also does not mean i am wrong. as i said. not everyone is the same. so we should have a client that is all encompassing so everyone is happy. like, it shouldn't make you UNhappy just because you find it useless. you just wouldn't use it. it would have helped in legend of the poro king. like. summoner icon IS poro skin. and i kept forgetting to put it on. so everything has a use sometimes.

Your own memory failure isn't a reason to implement changing summoner icons within team lobby.

You can't appease 100% of the people 100% of the time, and your proposal for letting people change summoner icon is the want of a minority.
sorry i did not realize you were master of statistics and omniscient of everything. my apologies lord. may you shape the world as you see fit.
